title: Agent-Powered Codebase Q&A / Onboarding

problem.en: Understanding a large or unfamiliar codebase is a significant challenge, especially when onboarding or debugging complex systems. Manually searching and tracing code paths is time-consuming and error-prone.
problem.ko: 크거나 익숙하지 않은 코드베이스를 이해하는 것은 특히 온보딩하거나 복잡한 시스템을 디버깅할 때 상당한 도전입니다. 수동으로 코드 경로를 검색하고 추적하는 것은 시간이 많이 걸리고 오류가 발생하기 쉽습니다.

solution.en: Leverage AI agents with retrieval, search, and Q&A capabilities to assist codebase understanding. Agent indexes the codebase, responds to natural language queries about code behavior, identifies function calls and component interactions, and summarizes modules.
solution.ko: 검색, 탐색, Q&A 기능을 갖춘 AI 에이전트를 활용하여 코드베이스 이해를 지원합니다. 에이전트는 코드베이스를 인덱싱하고, 코드 동작에 대한 자연어 쿼리에 응답하고, 함수 호출과 컴포넌트 상호작용을 식별하고, 모듈을 요약합니다.

mermaid_diagram:
sequenceDiagram
    Developer->>Agent: "Where is the database connection configured?"
    Agent->>Codebase: Search/Analyze
    Agent-->>Developer: "It's configured in config/database.js and used by the UserService."
code_example:
# Agent-Powered Codebase Q&A Examples

# Query: Understanding authentication flow
query = "How does user authentication work in this module?"
response = agent.ask_codebase(query)
# Response: "Authentication is handled in auth/middleware.ts...
#           It uses JWT tokens validated against the user service..."

# Query: Finding function usage
query = "Where is the processPayment function called from?"
response = agent.ask_codebase(query)
# Response: "processPayment is called from:
#           - checkout/PaymentController.ts:45
#           - subscriptions/RenewalService.ts:112"

# Query: Component interaction
query = "How do the Cart and Inventory components interact?"
response = agent.ask_codebase(query)
# Response: "Cart calls InventoryService.checkStock() before..."

en: Massive step function for unfamiliar code
Finds interactions manual search would miss
ko: 익숙하지 않은 코드에 대한 큰 도약
